xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/405848-Abbas Kiarostami: The Art of Living 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5DRRcdDfLnkEZWfSydUO4v2XsRd.jpg Through an interview with Kiarostami in the Aran Islands and interviews with film critics and scholars at Cannes, the director examines Kiarostami's themes and methods. The director also profiles Kiarostami as a poet and a photographer. Abbas Kiarostami: The Art of Living
